The app is free, and actually does translate onscreen info. However, I have found the accuracy of the translations to be nonexistent. While it is understandable, it completely defeats the purpose of the app, and needs to be addressed ASAP. Google Translate is a lot further along accuracy-wise than this app.

The app was convenient for me who loves to play foreign games. Although it sometimes have a mistranslation. Anyways this app is better than any other apps ( they are not free, or it was hard to use ) The most good thing is this app doesn't have adds

This is absolutely amazing, at first I thought you could only translate using the built-in translator, but boy oh boy, it does the ocr work and then you can choose to use google translate, it won't change app so you can keep translating over and over. You can choose what portion of the screen to translate, and it's very easy to select the area. Overall I'd give this app a 9.5/10 as it sometimes needs 1/2 extra tries to scan the text correctly, but it's very rare. Super recommended app.
The translations aren't really that great, but it does what it needs to do in a pinch.
Amazing thank you so much!!! Very smooth, simple, and ads aren't bothersome. Easily 5 star :)

As someone who plays JP games, this app is a staple for me. While the OCR does have issues, I've simply adjusted by getting a JP keyboard & fixing up what will be translated myself. Sadly my kanji leaves a Lot to desire, but I can manage by magnifying a screenshot. The "hassles" are worth it w a free app that has neither ads nor limits. One thing I don't blame the app for having issues with is Stylized fonts. The OCR doesn't do well w them & frankly neither do I.
Truly useful! thanks for making this apps

Better then the rest, but still needs improvements...(specially in ocr scanning) I like the fact that it dosen't have usage caps like other on screen translators!

TL;DR : it's far better than the rest, super awesome app 1. It worked, simple, and easy to use (at least for me) 2. It's full free, no ads, no limit usage (this is the reason I straight up give *5) Yes, if you're like me who played a foreign (especially JP) games and need in game screen translation, this is the app you're looking for. The others are full of ads, and it's not free just to get more translation. (Spoiler alert : they just give you like 10 times trial)
